title: Trump reveals new 'Patriot Games' competition
shortDescription: President Donald Trump touted the "Patriot Games" next year in a video address that also emphasized "no men playing in women’s sports."

title: Kennedy Center changes name to include President Trump. See the sign
shortDescription: The Kennedy Center voted to rename the facility "The Donald J. Trump and The John F. Kennedy Memorial Center for the Performing Arts."

title: Trump OK informing Congress of Venezuela attacks
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he has 'no problem' informing Congress of future attacks regarding Venezuela.

title: House backs massive defense policy bill, Senate next
shortDescription: The House of Representatives passed a massive defense policy bill on Dec. 10, authorizing a record $901 billion in annual military spending.

title: Trump doesn't rule out war with Venezuela
shortDescription: Trump refused to rule out the possibility of war with Venezuela in an interview with NBC News.

title: The deadline is here: Will Trump DOJ release the Epstein files? Live updates
shortDescription: “Several hundred thousand documents" will be made public today, Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche said.

title: Trump launches effort to enact his vision for America's birthday bash
shortDescription: Major celebrations are on the way in 2026 for the country's 250th birthday. President Donald Trump is helping shape them.

title: Is Trump repeating Biden's mistake on the economy?
shortDescription: Presidents historically misjudge public perception about the economy and ignore voter's frustration at their own peril, experts say.

title: Trump's $1,776 'Warrior Dividends' not funded by tariffs as he implied
shortDescription: The Pentagon, not tariff revenue, is covering the $2.6 billion price tag for $1,776 "Warrior Dividends" to go to all 1.45 million US service members.

title: Trump to host 'Patriot Games' for high school athletes from each state
shortDescription: High school athletes from each state will face off against each other in a four-day competition that critics are comparing to the Hunger Games.

title: Trump's stance on the Epstein files has changed over time. What to know
shortDescription: As conspiracy theories around the Jeffrey Epstein case swirled, Trump has been asked what he would do. His answers have changed, here's how.

title: Kennedy Center to be renamed Trump-Kennedy Center
shortDescription: The White House announced the Kennedy Center will be renamed the Trump-Kennedy Center.

title: Trump signs EO on federal marijuana
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order easing federal marijuana restrictions.

title: Trump reclassifies marijuana as less dangerous drug
shortDescription: Trump signed an executive order reclassifying marijuana as a less dangerous drug. The change could help the industry without legalizing the drug.

title: ¿Militares recibirán $1,776? Trump anuncia el ‘warrior dividend
shortDescription: Trump bautizó el pago como “warrior dividend”, un dividendo que —dijo— honra el año fundacional de Estados Unidos (1776) y reconoce el sacrificio de quienes visten el uniforme.

title: Kennedy Center renamed the 'Trump-Kennedy Center,' White House says
shortDescription: The John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts in Washington is now called the the "Trump-Kennedy Center," according to the White House.

title: The Epstein saga in Trump's own words. See his comments on the file
shortDescription: The controversy around Jeffrey Epstein has been a thorn in the side of Donald Trump's second presidency for months. What has Trump said about it?
